name: upc-blockchain-tfm-2021-2022
description: This repositoty contains all files related to TFM(Treball Fi de Master) of the Blockchain Master degree coursed during 2021/2022 academic year.

scripts.deploy: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.install: cd packages/hardhat && npm i && cd ../react-app && npm i
